item.title: Hunting Trial With a .50 Cal Didn’t Go as Expected
item.description: A lighthearted look at a large-caliber firearm test and the unexpected challenges that came with it. What would you have anticipated in this scenario?

item.title: A .50 Cal Test Meets the Woods
item.description: This supervised field test shows how a high-powered round interacts with natural obstacles and why safety and planning matter. What surprised you most?

item.description: A look at what happens when a powerful firearm is tested in an outdoor setting. What would you assess before attempting a demo like this?

item.title: Twins, Yawt Yawt, and the Hog Trap Setup
item.description: A light-hearted look at setting up a hog trap with the twins and Yawt Yawt, emphasizing planning, safety, and farm know-how. What part of the setup will surprise them most?

item.title: Trying Out a New Plasma Cutter
item.description: A first test of a new plasma cutter gifted by his wife, showing setup, safety steps, and clean cutting results in the workshop. What project should this tool tackle next?

item.title: Twins and Hogs in a Farm Challenge
item.description: The twins take part in a supervised farm task involving hog management, focusing on safety, teamwork, and technique rather than risk. What unexpected moments will the challenge bring?

item.description: Grandpa and the twins compare their accuracy, which team will show better technique?

item.title: How to Use a Brush Cutter Safely and Correctly
item.description: A practical guide to operating a brush cutter with proper grip, stance, and safety steps to achieve clean, efficient clearing. Which tip will help you most on your next outdoor job?

item.title: Reviving Bullnose Cabover Truck After 30 Years!

item.title: Restoring an Old Bruin 10
item.description: A step-by-step look at bringing a Bruin 10 back into working condition, from inspection to careful repairs and final testing. How well does it run after the revival?

item.title: Recovering a Dozer from the Swamp
item.description: The team works through mud, water, and tight spaces to safely recover a dozer stuck deep in a swamp, using careful planning and steady teamwork. Will the machine make it out?
